author: Nate Raymond
description: An associate professor of dentistry at the University of Southern California has agreed to plead guilty to a tax offense stemming from his role in a U.S. college admissions scandal, prosecutors said on Thursday.
title: Dentistry associate professor to plead guilty in U.S. college admissions scandal - Reuters
content: A sign is pictured on the grounds of University of Southern California in Los Angeles, California, U.S., March 13, 2019. REUTERS/Mario AnzuoniBOSTON, July 1 (Reuters) - An associate professor of dent… [+1960 chars]

author: Jane Lee
description: For Chinese brain researcher Song Chen, a visiting scholar at Stanford University when she was arrested last July on a visa fraud charge, a court hearing last month in San Francisco brought some hope.
title: Chinese scientists ensnared in U.S. visa fraud legal battle - Reuters
content: SAN FRANCISCO, June 17 (Reuters) - For Chinese brain researcher Song Chen, a visiting scholar at Stanford University when she was arrested last July on a visa fraud charge, a court hearing last month… [+6391 chars]

author: Reuters
description: The Oxford University scientists who invented the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine are among those to be honoured by Queen Elizabeth, among a number of recipients who played key roles in Britain's coronavirus response, the government said on Friday.
title: Oxford vaccine inventors recognised in Queen's Birthday Honours - Reuters UK
content: The Oxford University scientists who invented the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine are among those to be honoured by Queen Elizabeth, among a number of recipients who played key roles in Britains coronav… [+1708 chars]

author: Reuters
description: A report from Oxford University saying that a longer gap between doses of AstraZeneca vaccines still provides protection is "very reassuring" for supply-strapped countries, World Health Organization chief scientist Soumya Swaminathan said on Friday.
title: WHO welcomes report on efficacy of longer gaps between AstraZeneca doses - Reuters
